properties.areaDesc: Pueblo Vicinity/Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet; Walsenburg Vicinity/Upper Huerfano River Basin Below 7500 Ft; Trinidad Vicinity/Western Las Animas County Below 7500 Ft
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 3 at 1:40PM MST until February 4 at 7:00PM MST by NWS Pueblo CO
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 6 inches
with locally higher snow amounts possible. Winds gusting around
20 mph at times.

* WHERE...Pueblo County and the southern I-25 Corridor, including
Walsenburg and Trinidad.

* WHEN...From 5 PM this afternoon to 7 PM MST Tuesday.

* IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult with icy and snow packed
roads. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce
visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening
commute on Monday and morning commute on Tuesday. The cold
wind chills as low as 15 below zero could result in
hypothermia if precautions are not taken.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: A WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 7 PM MST TUESDAY
